name: Watercolor Print Notecards
description:
These 4.5" X 6" folded notecards are prints of the artwork of Bruce Lucas. Each package contains 6 notecards with envelopes in a clear plastic bag. FREE SHIPPING!

WATERMARK WILL NOT APPEAR ON NOTECARDS

Click on the image to view all choices.
**********************************
Watercolor has always been the favorite medium for Bruce Lucas. Exploring various techniques enables him to combine unique blends of color to show the beauty of our world. Colorful street scenes and quiet landscapes invite you to remember past visits to favorite places. The sweet smell of flowers from your garden is depicted in his floral designs. A quiet repose envelops you as you gaze on the scenes of the beach.

name: Summer Hideaway Watercolor Print
description:
“Why not get a place of your own at the beach? Or, enjoy this beach home every day – you can almost hear the waves from the beach!”

Print measures 12x18

WATERMARK WILL NOT BE ON PRINT.

**********************************

name: Three White Flowers I & II Original Watercolor
description:
“Delicate white flowers will create a light, airy atmosphere no matter what
room they are in. Subtle greens, blues, and lavender add depth to each.”

Each painting measures 20x16 and is matted. Set of 2.

WATERMARK WILL NOT BE ON PAINTING.

**********************************

name: Big Rose Original Watercolor
description:
A beautiful pink rose is a welcome sight to summer in the South.
This original watercolor measures 28" x 21" and is already matted.

WATERMARK WILL NOT BE ON PAINTING.
